text: “Thiĩi mũkanduĩrĩrie ũhoro kũrĩ Jehova, na mũtuĩrĩrie andũ, o na Juda yothe, ũrĩa kwandĩkĩtwo ibuku-inĩ rĩĩrĩ rĩonekete. Marakara ma Jehova nĩ maingĩ, marĩa maraakana nĩ ũndũ witũ, tondũ maithe maitũ matiaathĩkĩire ũhoro wa ibuku rĩĩrĩ; na matiekire kũringana na ũhoro ũrĩa wothe wandĩkĩtwo thĩinĩ warĩo ũrĩa ũtũkoniĩ.”
